Vamsi K Hari   
404-780-1486 | vamsi.hari@gmail.com| https://www.linkedin.com/in/vamsi-hari-82687419 
Summary:    
 
➢ DevOps engineer with over 21 years of IT experience, including 5+ years successfully leading and mentoring 
a team of DevOps engineers, driving innovation and efficiency 
 
➢ Strong technical background in a wide range of technologies and tools, including CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, 
GitHub Actions), containerization, version control systems, infrastructure management, and security 
testing frameworks. 
 
➢ Experienced in DevSecOps practices, embedding security throughout the software development lifecycle. 
 
➢ Led transformations to adopt new technologies, processes, and best practices, driving organizational 
change and continuous improvement. 
 
➢ Extensive experience with the Atlassian toolset, including JIRA, Confluence, and Bitbucket, for project 
management, collaboration, and version control.

change and continuous improvement. 
 
➢ Extensive experience with the Atlassian toolset, including JIRA, Confluence, and Bitbucket, for project 
management, collaboration, and version control. 
 
➢ Proven ability to bridge the gap between development and operations, fostering a collaborative and agile 
environment. 
 
➢ Recognized for effective leadership in developing high-performance, collaborative, and cohesive teams 
that eliminate barriers, improve efficiency, and achieve business goals and objectives. 
 
➢ Skilled in cost projection and resource planning, optimizing the allocation of resources to maximize 
efficiency and control expenses. 
 
➢ Poised to make significant contributions to organizations seeking to enhance their software delivery 
capabilities, integrate security into their processes, and achieve operational excellence.   
   
Technical Skills:      
 
Azure DevOps, AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub actions, Helm, Maven, Ansible, Nginx, JFrog

uDeploy, TeamCity

Professional Experience:    
  
Manager/DevOps Engineering                             Aug 2023 – Present    
Scientific Games, Atlanta, GA     
The DevOps Engineering team is responsible for designing, build and support deployment pipeline platform for 
applications supporting secured lottery platforms.  
Responsibilities:    
• Designed CI/CD application pipeline architecture deploying container applications to AWS EKS and EKSA 
environments.  
• Evangelized culture of DevSecOps by educating and mentoring teams.   
• Architected a secure container registry orchestration system, ensuring secure storage and isolation of 
container images across environments.   
• Spearheaded vendor selection and evaluation, procuring tools that integrate into DevSecOps CI/CD 
ecosystem.  
• Collaborated  with  multiple  development  teams,  identifying  gaps  and  opportunities  for  process 
modernization.

ecosystem.  
• Collaborated  with  multiple  development  teams,  identifying  gaps  and  opportunities  for  process 
modernization.   
• Successfully demonstrated a CI/CD pipeline using GitLab CI capabilities and ArgoCD for deployment to an 
EKS cluster Integrating Snyk for security scanning.  
    
Manager/Tech Lead DevOps Enablement                               Mar 2016 – May 2023    
InComm, Atlanta, GA     
The DevOps Enablement team is responsible for facilitating seamless deployments for applications processing 
GiftCard transactions by empowering teams to adopt DevOps principles, practices using effective tools.   
Responsibilities:    
• Successfully lead and manage a team of DevOps engineers, providing guidance, mentorship to support 
200+ application CI/CD pipelines and handful of DevOps tools.    
• Identify opportunities for DevOps process improvement, automation, and efficiency gains and define 
tmelines and goals.

200+ application CI/CD pipelines and handful of DevOps tools.

tmelines and goals.    
• Consolidated multiple DevOps tools license allocation and usage across orgnization, and re-negotiated 
with supplier which resulted in saving the company $500k+ annually.    
• A key member of the architectural team which handles DevOps technology innovations and integrations.

• Create and maintain fully automated pipelines using Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Github actions integrating 
SAST, SCA, Test automation tools deploying to both on-prem and Azure.    
• Proficient in building and deploying containerized applications using docker and Kubernetes   
• Manage and Administrate development support tools like – Subversion, GitHub, Jenkins, jFrog-Artifactory    
• Administrate Atlassian suite tools JIRA, Confluence, Fisheye/Crucible 
• Migrated Jira on-prem instant to Cloud platform 
• Configure and troubleshoot software runtime environment and provide development and incident support    
• Create and update deployment metrics and dashboards to track quality and efficiency of deployments
